basics.name: Attila Vajda, CFA
basics.label:
My specialties developed during my work in various local, regional and global leadership roles include institutional sales and trading, emerging market and Vietnamese investments (both equity and fixed income), project management, marketing & communication, and organizational development & strategy. 

I have been awarded as the “Best Salesperson in Vietnam” at the 2011 AsiaMoney Brokers Poll and I am a CFA charterholder since September 2013. On a voluntary basis I also serve as the Chairman of the Board of Advisors for AIESEC in Vietnam since April 2012.

work.company: Project Asia Research & Consulting Pte. Ltd., Singapore | HCMC
work.desc: Managing Research, Consulting, Advisory and Investment projects as well as a private equity portfolio in Southeast Asia.

work.company: ACB Securities (ACBS), Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam
work.desc: I built and lead the award winning Sales and Trading teams of ACBS that served both local and foreign Institutional Clients exploring Vietnamese investment opportunities.

work.company: DHL Asia Pacific - Global Customer Solutions, Singapore
work.desc: Managed the after sales activities for a portfolio of global customers in the Life Science and Technology Industries.
Responsable of Brand Implementation in the Asia Pacific Region and for different ATL and BTL Projects/Campaigns across Asia.

I was responsible for the branding initiative and marketing communication activities at global level for AIESEC International, as well as contributing to the overall strategic direction of the organization.

This global role required leading over 90 country offices and working in diverse virtual & physical teams across the globe.

I was responsible for the sales and marketing activities at national level in the country office of AIESEC Romania and was leading the city level offices, as well as contributing to the overall strategic direction of the organization.
Lead the Local Committee of AIESEC in Oradea consisting of over 30 people.
